trans:
Step 2: Get access to Rewards Hub to look for your tasks.
Step 3: Finish the verification of identity and top up the minimum amount of $100 within seven (7) days.
Finish and receive 2 raffle tickets right away!
Top up Now
ğŸ¯ Second duty: Transaction of $50,000
Reach a total trading volume with the minimum of $50,000 worth in spot and/ or derivatives since the beginning of the task. Finish and get 2 raffle tickets right away. You are also able to accumulate more tickets each time you reach your aim.
ğŸ¯ Third duty: Transaction of $250,000
Reach a total trading volume with the minimum of  $250,000 worth in spot and/ or derivatives since the beginning of the task. Finish and get 2 raffle tickets right away. You are also able to accumulate more tickets each time you reach your aim.
